TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SyndicationPerson extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示新聞訂閱內容的作者或參與者。

span.span: Represents an author or contributor of syndication content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以將 物件加入至 和 物件上的作者和參與者集合中。 objects can be added to the authors and contributors collections on and objects. 序列化為 Atom 1.0 時，會將 做為 `` 或 `` 項目寫出。When serialized to Atom 1.0, the is written out as an `` or `` element. 序列化為 RSS 2.0 時，會將 執行個體做為 ``、`` 或 `` 項目寫出。When serialized to RSS 2.0, a instance is written out as a ``, ``, or `` element. 序列化 的方式需取決於新增至 或 的 物件數目、 執行個體新增至哪一個集合，以及傳入 `SerializeExtensionAsAtom` 建構函式的 參數值。How a is serialized depends on the number of objects added to a or , which collection the instances are added to, and the value of the `SerializeExtensionAsAtom` parameter to the constructor. 如果只新增一個 至 (或 ) 集合中， 會序列化為 `` 項目。If only one is added to the (or ) collection, the is serialized to a `` element. 如果新增一個以上的 至 (或 ) 集合中，而且 `SerializeExtensionsAsAtom` 設定為 `true`，所有的 物件都會序列化為 `` 項目。If more than one is added to the (or ) collection and `SerializeExtensionsAsAtom` is set to `true`, all of the objects are serialized to `` elements. 如果 `SerializeExtensionsAsAtom` 設定為 `false`， 執行個體便不會序列化。If `SerializeExtensionsAsAtom` is set to `false`, the instances is not serialized. 只有在 設為 時，才會序列化任何新增至 (或 `SerializeExtensionsAsAtom`) 集合的 `true` 執行個體，在這個情況中會序列化為 `` 項目。Any instances added to the (or ) collection are only serialized if `SerializeExtensionsAsAtom` is set to `true`, in which case they are serialized to `` elements. ## Examples 下列程式碼會示範如何將 加入至 執行個體的作者集合。The following code shows how to add a to the authors collection of a instance. [!code-csharp[SyndicationPerson#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationperson/cs/program.cs#8)] [!code-vb[SyndicationPerson#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationperson/vb/snippets.vb#8)] 下列 XML 顯示 如何序列化為 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how a is serialized to Atom 1.0. remarks.format: ## Remarks 新聞訂閱物件模型允許您新增自訂 XML 項目至 執行個體。The Syndication object model allows you to add custom XML elements to a instance. 只要項目命名空間與包含命名空間不同，您便可以新增任何有效的 XML 項目。You can add any valid XML element as long as the element namespace and the containing namespace are different. 序列化為 Atom 1.0 時，會將任何自訂項目做為 `` 或 `` 項目內的 XML 項目寫入。When serialized to Atom 1.0, any custom element is written as an XML element within an `` or `` element. 序列化為 RSS 2.0 時，會將任何自訂項目做為 ``、`` 或 `` 項目內的 XML 項目寫入。When serialized to RSS 2.0, any custom element is written as an XML element within the ``, ``, or `` elements. ## Examples 下列程式碼示範如何將項目延伸加入至 執行個體。The following code shows how to add an element extension to a instance. [!code-csharp[SyndicationPerson#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationperson/cs/program.cs#10)] [!code-vb[SyndicationPerson#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/syndicationperson/vb/snippets.vb#10)] 下列 XML 會說明 集合如何序列化為 Atom 1.0。The following XML shows how the collection is serialized to Atom 1.0. span.span: The name of the element.

The attribute to parse.

param.span: 剖析時要使用的新聞訂閱版本。

Attempts to parse an attribute extension.

returns.span: 指定是否已成功剖析屬性延伸的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the attribute extension was parsed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性延伸是指未由 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格定義的自訂屬性，Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 它們會序列化為 Atom 1.0 中 `` 或 `` 項目的屬性，或是序列化為 RSS 2.0 中 ``、`` 或 `` 項目的屬性。They are serialized as an attribute of the `` or `` element for Atom 1.0 or ``, ``, or `` element for RSS 2.0. 這個方法是延伸點，可讓您處理自訂屬性延伸的還原序列化作業。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom attribute extension. 若要執行這項動作，您必須自 衍生類別，並且覆寫這個方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 這個方法是針對所有無法辨識的屬性延伸來呼叫。This method is called for all unrecognized attribute extensions.

exception.span: 在讀取期間遇到無效的 XML。

span.span: Invalid XML encountered during read.

Attempts to parse an element extension.

returns.span: 指定是否已成功剖析項目延伸的值。

span.span: A value that specifies whether the element extension was parsed successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目延伸是指 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格中未指定的有效 XML 項目。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 假設某個有效 XML 項目的命名空間與封入命名空間不同，您便可將任何此類項目新增為延伸。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 這個方法是延伸點，可讓您處理自訂項目延伸的還原序列化作業。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the deserialization of a custom element extension. 若要執行這項動作，您必須自 衍生類別，並且覆寫這個方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 這個方法是針對所有無法辨識的項目延伸來呼叫。This method is called for all unrecognized element extensions.

exception.span: 在讀取期間遇到無效的 XML。

span.span: Invalid XML encountered during read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性延伸是指未由 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格定義的自訂屬性，Attribute extensions are custom attributes that are not defined by the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 它們會序列化為 Atom 1.0 中 `` 或 `` 項目的屬性，或是序列化為 RSS 2.0 中 ``、`` 或 `` 項目的屬性。They are serialized as an attribute of the `` or `` element for Atom 1.0 or ``, ``, or `` element for RSS 2.0. 這個方法是擴充點，可讓您處理自訂屬性延伸的序列化作業。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the serialization of custom attribute extensions. 若要執行這項動作，您必須自 衍生類別，並且覆寫這個方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 這個方法是針對所有無法辨識的屬性延伸來呼叫。This method is called for all unrecognized attribute extensions.

.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void WriteElementExtensions(class System.Xml.XmlWriter writer, string version) cil managed
Protected Friend Overridable Sub WriteElementExtensions (writer As XmlWriter, version As String)
protected public: virtual void WriteElementExtensions(System::Xml::XmlWriter ^ writer, System::String ^ version);
abstract member WriteElementExtensions : System.Xml.XmlWriter * string -> unit override this.WriteElementExtensions : System.Xml.XmlWriter * string -> unit

span.span: The to write to.

param.name: version
param.span: 寫入期間要使用的新聞訂閱版本。

span.span: The syndication version to use while writing.

summary.span: 使用指定的新聞訂閱版本，將項目延伸寫入至指定的 。

span.span: Writes the element extensions to the specified using the specified syndication version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 項目延伸是指 Atom 1.0 或 RSS 2.0 規格中未指定的有效 XML 項目。Element extensions are valid XML elements that are not specified in either the Atom 1.0 or RSS 2.0 specifications. 假設某個有效 XML 項目的命名空間與封入命名空間不同，您便可將任何此類項目新增為延伸。You can add any valid XML element as an extension, provided its namespace is different from the enclosing namespace. 這個方法是擴充點，可讓您處理自訂項目延伸的序列化作業。This method is an extension point that allows you to handle the serialization of custom element extensions. 若要執行這項動作，您必須自 衍生類別，並且覆寫這個方法。To do this, you must derive a class from and override this method. 這個方法是針對所有無法辨識的項目延伸來呼叫。This method is called for all unrecognized element extensions.
